personality.aiDescription: You're the calculated risk-taker who thrives in chaos. When the game hangs in the balance, you find your true power.

timeline.title: The Humble Beginning
timeline.description: Started in Gold II, grinding through placements with determination.
timeline.highlight: First pentakill of the season on Yasuo

timeline.title: The Breaking Point
timeline.description: Hit a massive loss streak. Dropped two divisions in one week.

timeline.title: Champion Mastery
timeline.description: Discovered Zed and everything clicked. Mechanics sharpened significantly.

timeline.title: The Diamond Push
timeline.description: Consistent performance and mental resilience led to the diamond breakthrough.

timeline.title: Peak Performance
timeline.description: Reached the highest rank of your career with a 12-game win streak.

timeline.title: Season Finale
timeline.description: Ended the season strong, maintaining Diamond despite tough competition.

achievements.title: Comeback King
achievements.description: Won 23 games where your team was down 10k+ gold

achievements.title: Assassin Virtuoso
achievements.description: Averaged 8.2 kills per game on assassin champions

achievements.title: 1v9 Warrior
achievements.description: Dealt 40%+ of team's damage in 47 games

achievements.title: Clutch Master
achievements.description: Won 18 games with sub-100 HP nexus

embarrassingFacts.title: Flash Fail Master
embarrassingFacts.description: Flashed into walls 47 times this season

embarrassingFacts.title: The Tilt Lord
embarrassingFacts.description: Your winrate after a loss is only 38% (compared to 64% after a win)

embarrassingFacts.title: Rage Quit Tendencies
embarrassingFacts.description: Left 3 games early after dying 5+ times

embarrassingFacts.title: Ward Allergic
embarrassingFacts.description: In 12 games, you placed 0 wards the entire match

teammates.name: ShadowKnight42
teammates.synergy: You two create early game pressure that opponents can't handle. When ShadowKnight roams mid, your kill participation jumps to 82%.

teammates.name: xXDragonSlayerXx
teammates.synergy: The perfect ganking duo. DragonSlayer's early game presence enables your aggressive laning style, resulting in a 73% first blood rate.

teammates.name: MidOrFeed
teammates.synergy: Communication issues lead to missed opportunities. Your playstyles clash - you peak mid-game while they need late game scaling.
